snippet: I'm reluctant to carp when we use a somewhat out-of-the-ordinary word. Sometimes it's the perfect choice, and many readers appreciate that The Times offers intelligent prose that isn't watered down.
abstract: I'm reluctant to carp when we use a somewhat out-of-the-ordinary word. Sometimes it's the perfect choice, and many readers appreciate that The Times offers intelligent prose that isn't watered down.
lead_paragraph: Notes from the newsroom on grammar, usage and style. (Some frequently asked questions are here.)
